name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: Profoundly moved by today’s Congressional Gold Medal ceremony for the hundreds of brave officers who defended me, my colleagues, & our democracy on January 6th. These heroes deeply deserve Congress’ highest honor for their extraordinary service & sacrifice.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: Great performance from the USMNT on & off the pitch. Young, strong & skilled, can’t wait to see what you accomplish stateside at the next World Cup.

name: Richard Blumenthal

name: Richard Blumenthal

tweet_text: Proud to serve as keynote speaker at the Maria Sanchez Awards Banquet led by the CICD Puerto Rican Parade of Greater Hartford, honoring extraordinary leaders&trailblazers. Maria’s amazing legacy lives on in them,&the fight for justice here&for fellow Americans in Puerto Rico.

name: Richard Blumenthal

name: Richard Blumenthal

name: Richard Blumenthal

name: Richard Blumenthal

Ticketmaster’s majority owner says it’s Taylor Swift’s fault for failing to do more shows. Not Ticketmaster’s manipulative fees, price hikes, & black box algorithms. 

No one believes this bunk.

name: Richard Blumenthal

Ticketmaster, with their profiteering, predatory practices, should look in the mirror&say: I’m the problem. It’s me. 

It’s time for DOJ to hold this bully accountable&enforce the terms of the Live Nation merger agreement to protect consumers or to break up this malign monopoly.

We owe them gratitude & more. https://t.co/Nc3hT2uHYu

name: Richard Blumenthal

The terrifying truth is that the attacks on reproductive freedom extend to birth control.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: Celebrating 75 years of brave & dedicated service, the Columbia Volunteer Fire Department is always there for the people of this magnificent town. Joining the event, I was honored to express gratitude & good wishes for many more years of excellent work.

name: Richard Blumenthal

tweet_text: Over 25 years, the Polish American Foundation has tirelessly provided opportunities in training, careers, housing, & more in the New Britain community & beyond. I was honored to join their celebration & pay tribute to this extraordinary public service.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: Sky high elation & deep relief—that’s how I feel after the Senator Cortez Masto’s tremendous victory. It’s a historic opportunity to carry forward transformative change, & help heal our divisions.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: Gun buybacks around the state today, like the one in Stamford I attended, drew hundreds of dangerous, unneeded, & unwanted firearms—including assault weapons & ghost guns. Thanks to police, @NewtownAction, & other groups for organizing it. https://t.co/z6npqrP47h

name: Richard Blumenthal

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text:
Yale’s tribute to vets today reminded us of the need to provide all with the benefits & care they need & deserve. Too often, our great nation has delayed addressing the invisible wounds of war—like chemical poisons from burn pits.
Now thankfully, the PACT Act assures action.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: Poignant dedication of a headstone for Jesse Caples’ grave, a Revolutionary War fighter who gained his freedom from slavery by helping achieve America’s freedoms from Britain. Thanks to the perseverance of his descendant, Frank Reese, his resting place in Middletown is honored.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: Veterans Day is always marked with deep respect & pride by the Naugatuck Veterans Council, including a moving ceremony this year recalling the town’s heroes. Standing room only inside St. Michael’s Parish Hall. Thank you to all who made it possible.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: Even in the rain, the National Veterans Council for Legal Redress drew a good crowd to Long Wharf in New Haven today for its awards ceremony. I was honored to receive one. Thanks to Conley & Garry Monk, this organization has aided countless veterans unjustly denied benefits.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: Strong support for the 2nd annual #KeepKidsSafe Gun BuyBack this weekend, initiated today by @NewtownAction. We recognize that more than half of all gun deaths are suicides & most veteran suicides are by guns. Buying back unwanted guns can save lives.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: Delighted & grateful to join Trinity Academy of Hartford’s annual gala—raising funds to expand its student body & make available its extraordinary educational opportunities to more underserved youngsters. Teachers, staff, board members, parents, & more all deserve thanks.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: This year’s CT Veterans Legal Center Saluting Service had special meaning yesterday on the eve of Veterans Day. I thanked this organization’s supporters for all their advocacy, including for the recently passed PACT Act, providing care&benefits to vets exposed to toxic chemicals.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: A good #VeteransDay to all who’ve served & their loved ones. They deserve to be honored every day, not merely in word but deed—care & benefits they’ve earned. No veteran left behind.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: Powerful, deeply emotional Kristallnacht commemoration at Sacred Heart University yesterday, with eloquent multi-faith participation. Thank you for this moving reminder that we must never forget, especially important at this moment.

name: Richard Blumenthal

tweet_text: Project Longevity’s “Call In” yesterday, involving law enforcement professionals & Hartford young people, showed dramatically the urgency of community violence intervention—outreach & engagement. Resources in the Bipartisan Safer Communities Act will help, but more are needed.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: Ensign-Bickford Aerospace & Defense produces cutting edge exciting technology & components vital to our national security. Its extraordinary workforce helps assure ground & air superiority, so our military never has a fair fight. Impressive new expansion plans!

It’s time to stop this corrupting influence in our politics.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: Saluting first responders on 9/11 requires more than words. They continue to suffer from hideous cancers & other horrific illnesses resulting from their exposure to toxic poisons at Ground Zero. The Fund providing care & compensation is running dry.

name: Richard Blumenthal

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: Many were saved by these efforts&the evacuation was the largest in history, but many more remain left behind. As long as our allies&their families remain in Afghanistan, or in danger elsewhere, the US has a moral obligation to continue its evacuation&resettlement efforts. 3/

tweet_text: I was also more deeply impressed than ever by the resilience & courage of Ukraine’s people in the face of Putin’s horrific atrocities. Our visit to Bucha—one site of Russia’s soul-shattering civilian murders—was moving beyond words. 3/

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: Our lengthy meeting with President Zelenskyy was remarkable for his grit, candor, vision, & resolve. He vitally needs more long-range multiple launch artillery & more advanced weapons, as well as humanitarian aid & stronger economic sanctions. 2/ https://t.co/G4bil3pkxx

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: .@LindseyGrahamSC & I are returning from Ukraine more convinced than ever that the Ukrainians can defeat Russia’s barbaric invasion if America provides the arms & aid it needs to win. Our message to @ZelenskyyUa & all Ukrainians was: The US has your back. 1/ https://t.co/6vc91SoxZ1

tweet_text: Time for action on gun violence without more delay. Steps President Biden can—& must take: finalize a ghost gun rule, establish a GVP office & czar, nominate a strong ATF Director, expand funds for community intervention, & more. He has the power. He should use it to save lives.

I am proud & honored to vote YES on her final confirmation. #ConfirmKBJ

name: Richard Blumenthal

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: Paying an 18.4 cents federal levy adds insult to injury on already sky high charges at the pump. Rising gasoline prices deeply burden individual lives & livelihoods every day, so both federal & state action is needed right away.

name: Richard Blumenthal

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: Respond to Zelenskyy’s plea today with action, not just more words—more anti tank & anti aircraft missiles, anti air batteries, drones, planes, & more to fight Russia’s bombing reign of terror. Every day matters, as Ukraine bravely struggles for survival. Act now.

name: Richard Blumenthal

name: Richard Blumenthal

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: Sincerity, decency, honesty—basic down-to-earth American values were brought home by President Biden to every American home & filled the historic House chamber. His vigor & vision made the American dream real. #SOTU

name: Richard Blumenthal

name: Richard Blumenthal

✔️Guarantee people’s right to abortion nationwide

name: Richard Blumenthal

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: I look forward to discussing Judge Jackson’s qualifications with colleagues on both sides of the aisle, as well as meeting with her & spending some time reviewing her record ahead of our Committee’s confirmation hearings.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: When we met earlier this month, I urged President Biden to nominate a Black woman with powerful intellect & profound integrity—& he has more than met that goal with Judge Jackson.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: Like her mentor Justice Breyer, Judge Jackson is grounded in the real-world with a strong sense of how legal abstractions dramatically impact everyday Americans. As Justice Breyer said about her, she has a unique combination of commonsense and thoughtfulness.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: This historic Supreme Court nomination is truly thrilling. Judge Jackson has an exceptional record of personal accomplishment & character with unquestionable qualifications as a dynamic, brilliant jurist. She is a star—an example of the best of America. https://t.co/zECXY4Mvsa

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: 9/ America continues to stand for freedom & democracy. We cannot sit idly by while a democratic nation is trampled under the boot of an authoritarian dictator bent on remaking the international order in a way that threatens peace & prosperity for all.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: 8/ We must continue to put economic pressure on Russia, Putin & his crony oligarchs. We must provide humanitarian assistance to Ukrainians fleeing his tyranny. We must continue to provide lethal assistance to the Ukrainian armed forces & resistance fighting this Russian invasion.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: 7/ That is why we must inflict strict penalties against Russian aggressors who have manufactured this needless war & provide the strongest possible support to the people of Ukraine.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: 6/ If he succeeds, we can expect the United States to face not only a pacing threat from China, but also an expansionist Russia that once again desires to dominate the former Soviet Republics along with wide swaths of Europe & the Middle East.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: 5/ This attack on Ukraine, a western democracy, is a direct threat to the national & economic security of the United States. We have already seen a jump in gas prices & turmoil in the stock market due to Putin’s actions.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: 4/ Vladimir Putin has violated core principles that uphold global peace & security, seeking to change the borders of a sovereign country by force & attacking the post-World War II global order.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: 3/ Today, the people of Ukraine woke to an unprovoked & multi-pronged attack on their country: an attack on peaceful cities across Ukraine & an attack on the right of sovereign peoples everywhere to determine their own future.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: 2/ We should aggressively push our allies to deny Russia access to the SWIFT world financial system & target Putin & his corrupt oligarchs with sanctions on their personal assets.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: 1/ The courage of Ukrainians fighting for their homeland should be matched by even stronger, crippling sanctions by America & its allies.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: Camp Courant is a state treasure—transforming young lives with joyful outdoors summer fun & inspiring role models. They will soon also have winter programs too. Thanks to Jimmy Altman & the wonderful crowd for supporting it yesterday afternoon.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: I’m listening to CT’s people who are hurting & hard hit by spiraling costs of gasoline, & rampant rising prices. They need & deserve a break—our legislation to suspend the federal gas tax will help to provide relief to consumers.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: I will keep working to ensure that businesses across the state have the robust & inclusive support they need to continue to recover from the pandemic.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: Costs & consequences must be swift, severe, & strong meeting Putin’s attack on the post-WWII world order. It is far past time to fully sanction Russia, Putin, & his oligarchs.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: My thoughts are with the people of Ukraine as Putin launches this premeditated, unprovoked attack. The USA stands with the Ukrainian people as they fight for their freedom from Russian tyranny.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: I’ve just finished reading “Facing the Mountain.” It’s a moving testament to the courageous Japanese American troops who fought to win WWII & the unspeakable hardships their families faced. On history & humanity, I highly recommend it.

name: Richard Blumenthal

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: Putin is making a severe miscalculation. Where he thought he could sow division in our transatlantic alliance—he is bringing us closer. Where he aims to limit NATO’s influence—he is proving its strength.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: Congress is preparing for all contingencies to meet Putin’s attack on world order with unity & resolve. Many of us on both sides of the aisle have urged powerful economic sanctions—& now bipartisan action must make it happen.

name: Richard Blumenthal

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: We must defend America. We must renew our nation’s commitment to protecting voting rights in this country. We simply cannot afford to give up this fight.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: There is no democratic freedom more fundamental than the right to vote. For decades, the filibuster has been a weapon against the advancement of civil rights—& tonight was no different. I’m disappointed—even devastated—but I’m not disheartened.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text:
Our democracy depends on defending the right to vote.

We have a chance today to protect against the cascading, escalating wave of voter suppression threatening to undermine our free & fair elections. 

Let’s get it done. #FreedomToVote

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text:
The filibuster & procedural tactics must not stand in the way of protecting people’s right to vote.

Let’s pass the Freedom to Vote Act & John Lewis Voting Rights Advancement Act.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: Now, the Senate must act to fortify & reinforce our institutions from poisonous, toxic attempts to restrict access to the ballot box under the guise of “mass voter fraud” & “stolen elections.” We must protect voting rights & our democracy.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: Today, my thoughts are with Capitol Police, Hill staffers, reporters, & all the essential custodial, food service, and other staff who serve our country & work in our temple of democracy in the name of public service.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: There is a direct through line from the Big Lie and the January 6 assault incited by Donald Trump, to violent extremism & domestic terrorism, to voter suppression & the overturning of elections, eventually to the destruction of our democracy.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: But January 6 was not a one-off. It was not an isolated or aberrant incident. It was a symptom & a symbol of a deeper destructive violence of radical extremism, a virus of domestic terrorism that continues to infect our nation.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: On this solemn anniversary, I’m reminded of how fragile & endangered our democratic institutions are when our leaders fail to protect them, & how close we came to shattering the traditions & norms & losing our democracy.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: Fueled by the Big Lie & baseless falsehoods of massive fraud, those domestic terrorists & violent extremists stormed the Capitol & hunted lawmakers & others while defacing & debasing not just the building, but the concept of democracy.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: It’s been one year since we were all witnesses to an abhorrent attack on our democracy. Rioters armed with bats & pipes, a Confederate flag in the halls of Congress, ruthless attacks on police officers—not a week goes by where I don’t think about that dark, terrible day.

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text:
"This policy needs to change. These at-risk Afghans need to be flown out of Afghanistan into safety & then vetted by Americans.

We are a proud nation that cares deeply about human rights, however, what we are doing is in inhumane."

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: "It’s devastating for me & for all of us veterans. If we go back on our word to our friends, we won’t have any friends left."

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: “I’m afraid the United States’ reputation has been irreparably damaged because they have so callously turned their backs on the people who sacrificed so much to help them."

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: "I haven’t slept or eaten for 4 weeks, wracked with fear that my family might die because of my service in the U.S. military.”

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: "All of the SIV applicants in my family have spouses, siblings &/or parents who are U.S. Citizens, yet they cannot get visas, & every time there was hope they could get out, it’s been dashed."

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: "They are being chased by the Taliban, hiding out in different places every night, to escape execution. One of them has an 88-year-old mother in a wheelchair who needs to move with him every couple of nights. Another is a man with an 8-month pregnant wife."

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: "So many of my brothers & sisters in & out of uniform are in disbelief that America could abandon Afghan allies who put their lives on the line for us & whom we promised to protect & bring to America when we left. Now we are leaving them to be slaughtered."

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text:
"We in the military live by a strict code of honor. When we give our word, we make every sacrifice to uphold it.

Both my best friend & my favorite cousin were killed by the Taliban in that effort."

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: "My family & I in Afghanistan & in the U.S. made great sacrifices for America in hopes of ensuring that 9/11 doesn’t happen again & to give a better life to Afghans, especially women & children."

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text:
"I’ve spent my entire adult life on active duty & as an intel officer in defense of this nation.

To say I’m heartbroken is an understatement."

name: Richard Blumenthal

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text:
There is a lot to be done, but a new era & administration are coming.

Now’s the moment to step up, take action, & pass commonsense gun violence legislation. Let’s get to work because enough is enough. 7/7

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text:
Gun Lobby Protections→Repeal PLCCA with the Equal Justice for Victims of Gun Violence Act

For too long, the gun lobby, bankrolled by dark money & the NRA, has blocked life-saving legislation while denying victims of gun violence their day in court. This must change. 6/7

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text:
People with access to guns who are a risk to themselves/others→Extreme Risk Protection Orders

These orders are proven policy. They've been utilized by states—including CT—to help avert thousands of tragedies. It's time to implement these commonsense measures nationally. 5/7

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text:
Domestic Abusers with Guns→Lori Jackson Domestic Violence Survivor Protection Act & Violence Against Women Act

Domestic abuse is 5x more likely to turn deadly when a gun is available. We need to keep guns out of the hands of abusers & improve support & care for survivors. 4/7

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text:
Ghost Guns→Untraceable Firearms Act

Access to a kit & 3D printer shouldn't be the only barrier stopping people from making a weapon. The new Admin can also direct ATF to classify ghost gun components as firearms—subjecting them to the same legal requirements as other guns. 3/7

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text:
Charleston Loophole→Background Check Completion Act

No check, no sale should be the rule so dangerous people can’t skirt background checks & make illegal gun purchases. Until we pass this legislation, the Biden Admin can work with DOJ to improve the notification process. 2/7

name: Richard Blumenthal
tweet_text: The new Congress & Biden Admin have a historic opportunity to take action on gun violence prevention. Building on the hard work & dedication of survivors, young people, activists & members of Congress, we have legislative & executive solutions that are ready to go on day one. 1/7
